lexUnit.name: forefinger.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the finger next to the thumb.

sentence.text: He found the place again , following the text with his forefinger .
The gardener opened his shears and wiped the grass clippings off the blades with his forefinger .
At least the socket in the tip of her left forefinger hardly showed .
She rubbed her chin slowly with her forefinger .
He cut his left forefinger across , and dunked it in his drink .
Her silent philosophising ended with a yelp of indignation as she found her forefinger nipped between strong white teeth .
He stopped and pushed his spectacles further up his nose with a forefinger in the gesture Meredith recalled .
The shirt was placed separately and Curtis jabbed at it with a thick , square forefinger .
She wiped her eyes with the back of a grubby forefinger and added more practically , ` You do n't have to worry about them , I 'm sure .
Eventually just two members of the jolly band remained , one a fellow of Irish extraction and the other a man with a twitching right forefinger .
The woman stabbed a bony forefinger just below Caroline 's breasts .
He also held his forefinger to his lips , indicating that they might be overheard .
He held up his forefinger and thumb .
He held up his forefinger .
He held up his left forefinger in front of her .
He leaned over the desk and jabbed a stubby forefinger at the flushed major .
He swung round and jabbed his forefinger at Melanie .
His hand trembling , Mungo took the note between thumb and forefinger , deliberately not touching the feather .
I lifted the vase between my thumb and forefinger .
I 'll grip it between thumb and forefinger , look it straight in the eye and say , ` You 've got to be fucking kidding . "
Paul unconsciously strokes his widow 's peak with thumb and forefinger .
She sat down in the chair at the head of the cot and very carefully slid her forefinger into the baby 's hand .
He adjusted his spectacles with the forefinger of his right hand before continuing .
Mildred eased her flabby body off the sofa and they sat opposite each other , forefingers of their right hands resting on the bottom of the glass .
Sucked the blood from the forefinger of his left hand .
PINCH TEST : This involves picking up a fold of skin ( on the horse 's neck ) between your forefinger and thumb , lifting it away from the neck , and then releasing it .
When Cawthorne was mentioned by name she put her forefinger and thumb together in a circle and made the universal sign for self-abuse .
He still held a small bowl in his hand and looked down at it , smoothing the porcelain with his forefinger and thumb in a kind of loving way .
